```css
// Property: scrollIndicatorStyle
// Description: Style of the scrollbar.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.ListView, Ti.UI.ScrollView, Ti.UI.TableView
'.scroll-indicator-style-black[platform=ios]': { scrollIndicatorStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.ScrollIndicatorStyle.BLACK }
'.scroll-indicator-style[platform=ios]': { scrollIndicatorStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.ScrollIndicatorStyle.DEFAULT }
'.scroll-indicator-style-white[platform=ios]': { scrollIndicatorStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.ScrollIndicatorStyle.WHITE }
```
